subject: Email Alert: 402 Pod Points from iPodSweepstakes
body:
Win A Free iPod From ipodsweepstakes.com

At SavingsAndCoupons.com, you will save money and get FREE stuff! 

Get 4 Pod Points when you join SavingsAndCoupons.com for FREE!
 Click Here. 


4 Pod Points





























Free Information and 20 Pod Points
Earn your degree from the comfort of your own home with a leading university.  

Get 20 Pod Points just for requesting FREE information about getting a degree!  
 Click Here. 


20 Pod Points





























Free Coupon and 14 Pod Points
Insomnia can represent a variety of different things.  No matter what the cause there are solutions.  

Get 14 Pod Points just for requesting a free coupon to help relieve your sleeping disorder!
 Click Here. 


14 Pod Points





























Try Vonage For Free and 360 Pod Points
Save lots of money on your phone service.  Vonage is a revolutionary new phone service that uses your broadband Internet connection.  Act now and you will get one month FREE! 

Get 360 Pod Points when you try Vonage for FREE!
 Click Here. 


360 Pod Points













Hurry, These Offers ExpireFriday, July 6, 2007!


















 

      Note: Neither iPodSweepstakes.com nor its parent company, ScotInteractive, Inc. are directly affiliated with Apple Computer, Inc.       You have received this message as part of your iPodSweepstakes.com membership. You agreed to receive these offers by email on
      8/16/2006 12:22:19 PM.  If this appears to be in error, or if you no longer wish to receive email from us,
      click here or email Helpdesk@iPodSweepstakes.com and type "unsubscribe" in the subject line, or write to us at 945 Clint Moore Road, Boca Raton, FL 33487.
